exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type Y : Type R : X -> Y -> Prop l : list X Unable to unify "list ?M1408" with "forall x : X, In x l -> exists y : Y, R x y".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
Y: Type
R: X -> Y -> Prop
l: list X

Goal:
(forall x : X, In x l -> exists y : Y, R x y) -> exists ll : list Y, Forall2 R l ll

Premises:
Forall2 : forall A B : Type, (A -> B -> Prop) -> list A -> list B -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Forall2_Forall : forall (X : Type) (R : X -> X -> Prop) (ll : list X), Forall2 R ll ll < -> Forall (fun x : X => R x x) ll
Forall2_cons_inv_r : forall (X Y : Type) (R : X -> Y -> Prop) (b : Y) (ll : list X) (mm : list Y), Forall2 R ll (b :: mm) -> {a : X & {ll' : list X | R a b /\ ll = a :: ll' /\ Forall2 R ll' mm}}
Forall2_mono : forall (X Y : Type) (R S : X -> Y -> Prop), (forall (x : X) (y : Y), R x y -> S x y) -> forall (l : list X) (m : list Y), Forall2 R l m -> Forall2 S l m
Forall_impl : forall (X : Type) (P Q : X -> Prop) (ll : list X), (forall x : X, In x ll -> P x -> Q x) -> Forall P ll -> Forall Q ll
Forall2_map_left : forall (X Y Z : Type) (R : Y -> X -> Prop) (f : Z -> Y) (ll : list Z) (mm : list X), Forall2 R (map f ll) mm < -> Forall2 (fun (x : Z) (y : X) => R (f x) y) ll mm
Forall2_map_right : forall (X Y Z : Type) (R : Y -> X -> Prop) (f : Z -> X) (mm : list Y) (ll : list Z), Forall2 R mm (map f ll) < -> Forall2 (fun (y : Y) (x : Z) => R y (f x)) mm ll
Forall2_cons_inv_l : forall (X Y : Type) (R : X -> Y -> Prop) (a : X) (ll : list X) (mm : list Y), Forall2 R (a :: ll) mm -> {b : Y & {mm' : list Y | R a b /\ mm = b :: mm' /\ Forall2 R ll mm'}}
list_has_dup_map_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (l : list X), (forall x y : X, In x l -> In y l -> f x = f y -> x = y) -> list_has_dup (map f l) -> list_has_dup l
Forall2_map_both : forall (X Y X' Y' : Type) (R : X -> Y -> Prop) (f : X' -> X) (g : Y' -> Y) (ll : list X') (mm : list Y'), Forall2 R (map f ll) (map g mm) < -> Forall2 (fun (x : X') (y : Y') => R (f x) (g y)) ll mm
map_cons_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (ll : list X) (y : Y) (m : list Y), map f ll = y :: m -> {x : X & {l : list X | ll = x :: l /\ f x = y /\ map f l = m}}
In_list_in_map_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (l : list X) (f : forall x : X, In x l -> Y) (y : Y), In y (list_in_map l f) -> exists (x : X) (Hx : In x l), y = f x Hx
measure_rect : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> nat) (P : X -> Type), (forall x : X, (forall y : X, m y < m x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall x : X, P x
Forall2_cons_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (R : X -> Y -> Prop) (x : X) (l : list X) (y : Y) (m : list Y), Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: m) < -> R x y /\ Forall2 R l m
Forall2_app_inv_r : forall (X Y : Type) (R : X -> Y -> Prop) (l : list X) (m1 m2 : list Y), Forall2 R l (m1 ++ m2) -> {l1 : list X & {l2 : list X | Forall2 R l1 m1 /\ Forall2 R l2 m2 /\ l = l1 ++ l2}}
List.Forall2_app_inv_r : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1' l2' : list B) (l : list A), Forall2 R l (l1' ++ l2') -> exists l1 l2 : list A, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\ l = l1 ++ l2
List.Forall2_app_inv_l : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A) (l' : list B), Forall2 R (l1 ++ l2) l' -> exists l1' l2' : list B, Forall2 R l1 l1' /\ Forall2 R l2 l2' /\ l' = l1' ++ l2'
Forall2_app_inv_l : forall (X Y : Type) (R : X -> Y -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list X) (m : list Y), Forall2 R (l1 ++ l2) m -> {m1 : list Y & {m2 : list Y | Forall2 R l1 m1 /\ Forall2 R l2 m2 /\ m = m1 ++ m2}}
list_in_map : forall (X Y : Type) (l : list X), (forall x : X, In x l -> Y) -> list Y
Forall2_nil_inv_l : forall (X Y : Type) (R : X -> Y -> Prop) (m : list Y), Forall2 R nil m -> m = nil
Forall2_nil_inv_r : forall (X Y : Type) (R : X -> Y -> Prop) (m : list X), Forall2 R m nil -> m = nil
Forall2_sind : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (P : list A -> list B -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (l : list A) (l0 : list B), Forall2 R l l0 -> P l l0
Forall2_ind : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (P : list A -> list B -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (l : list A) (l0 : list B), Forall2 R l l0 -> P l l0
map_app_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (ll : list X) (m n : list Y), map f ll = m ++ n -> {l : list X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ r /\ m = map f l /\ n = map f r}}
Forall2_cons : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l')
list_dec : forall (X : Type) (P Q : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, {P x} + {Q x}) -> forall l : list X, {x : X | In x l /\ P x} + {forall x : X, In x l -> Q x}
list_has_dup_ind : forall (X : Type) (P : list X -> Prop), (forall (l : list X) (x : X), In x l -> P (x :: l)) -> (forall (l : list X) (x : X), list_has_dup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list X, list_has_dup l -> P l
list_has_dup_sind : forall (X : Type) (P : list X -> SProp), (forall (l : list X) (x : X), In x l -> P (x :: l)) -> (forall (l : list X) (x : X), list_has_dup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list X, list_has_dup l -> P l
Permutation_Forall2 : forall (A B : Type) (P : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l1' : list A) (l2 : list B), l1 ~p l1' -> Forall2 P l1 l2 -> exists l2' : list B, l2 ~p l2' /\ Forall2 P l1' l2'
list_injective_rect : forall (X : Type) (P : list X -> Type), P nil -> (forall (x : X) (l : list X), ~ In x l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list X, list_injective l -> P l
list_injective_inv : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (ll : list X), list_injective (x :: ll) -> ~ In x ll /\ list_injective ll
in_split : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), In x l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ x :: l2
Forall2_app : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A) (l1' l2' : list B), Forall2 R l1 l1' -> Forall2 R l2 l2' -> Forall2 R (l1 ++ l2) (l1' ++ l2')
list_assoc : forall X Y : Type, eqdec X -> X -> list (X * Y) -> option Y
finite_pigeon_hole : forall (X : Type) (l m : list X), length l < length m -> incl m l -> exists (x : X) (aa bb cc : list X), m = aa ++ x :: bb ++ x :: cc
in_prod : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B) (x : A) (y : B), In x l -> In y l' -> In (x, y) (list_prod l l')
incl_cons_rinv : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (l m : list X), incl m (x :: l) -> exists m1 m2 : list X, m ~p m1 ++ m2 /\ Forall (eq x) m1 /\ incl m2 l
In_list_assoc : forall (X Y : Type) (eq_X_dec : eqdec X) (x : X) (l : list (X * Y)), In x (map fst l) -> {y : Y | list_assoc eq_X_dec x l = Some y /\ In (x, y) l}
Permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, l ~p l0 -> P l l0
RingMicromega.cltb_sound : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cplus ctimes cminus : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb cleb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R) (E : Type) (pow_phi : BinNums.N -> E) (rpow : R -> E -> R), RingMicromega.SORaddon rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle cO cI cplus ctimes cminus copp ceqb cleb phi pow_phi rpow -> forall x y : C, RingMicromega.cltb ceqb cleb x y = true -> rlt (phi x) (phi y)
remove : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> A -> list A -> list A

```  
intros x y H.
apply remove.
```

original: intros x y H. apply remove.
